channel.title: Some questions
channel.description:
hi everyone its me again with more problems lol btw my server is based on phonescape v1
[b]IP ban [/b] aready posted noone has a solution but lothys tut which dosnt work for me dont know why
[b]working duel arena [/b] dos anyone know how to do this [b] maximum number of connections[/b] is there anything i can do to set maximum connections [b] working castle wars not for pimpscape [/b] anyone?
if anyone can help me please do
thankyou for your time

item.title: Some questions

item.description:

Eh Pretty Easy:

It will stop them… I think. But if it won’t then just put their ip into the bannedips.txt file.

which will also not stop them from making new user

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @ianternet ianternet
item.description:
@ianternet wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:2, topic:70962”]if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 3) String victim = command.substring(6); if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase("localhost)) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!"); } else { PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToIp(victim); } }
Add that command… and add this int.

public int ipban = 0;

thankyou but that wont stop them from making new account sorry i should have explained better

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 3) String victim = command.substring(6); if((victim.equalsIgnoreCase("localhost)) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!"); } else { PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToIp(victim); } }
Add that command… and add this int.

public int ipban = 0;
